value: 1)Aaron Paul is an American actor best known for his role as Jesse Pinkman in Breaking Bad.

2)He has won several awards for his role in Breaking Bad, including the Critics' Choice Television Award for Best Supporting Actor in a Drama Series (2014) and three Saturn Awards for Best Supporting Actor on Television (2009, 2011, 2013).

3)In addition to his role in Breaking Bad, Paul has appeared in several other television shows and movies, including the HBO series Big Love (2006 2011), the Netflix animated series BoJack Horseman (2014 2020), and the Hulu drama series The Path (2016 2018).
4)Paul was born in Emmett, Idaho, in 1979, the youngest of four children.
He graduated from Centennial High School in Boise in 1997 and moved to Los Angeles soon after.
5)Paul is married to actress and director Lauren Parsekian, and the couple have two children.
